home.title: Sahel AgriConnect
home.subtitle: Digitalization of agriculture in Mali and Burkina Faso
home.projectDescription: The Sahel Agricultural Transformation Project (PTASS) aims to digitalize and modernize agriculture in Mali and Burkina Faso to achieve food sovereignty and enhance local production.

foodSovereignty.title: Food Sovereignty
foodSovereignty.description: Ensure food autonomy for populations in Mali and Burkina Faso through modern and sustainable agriculture.

valorization.title: Valorization
valorization.description: Maximize the value of local agricultural production and improve incomes for farmers and cooperatives.

period.title: Period 2026-2030
period.description: Five-year roadmap to sustainably transform agriculture in the Sahel region.

priorityCereals.title: Priority Cereals
priorityCereals.description: Essential local production for food security

standard.title: Standard Quality
standard.description: Production meeting basic standards for local consumption and regional markets.

premium.title: Premium Quality
premium.description: High-quality production for urban markets and regional export with certification.

excellence.title: Excellence Quality
excellence.description: Certified excellence production for international export with complete traceability.

irrigation.title: Irrigation
irrigation.description: Development of modern and sustainable irrigation systems to improve agricultural productivity and reduce dependence on seasonal rainfall.

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: Optimization of logistics chains to facilitate transport of agricultural products from production areas to local and international markets.

growthPotential.title: Growth Potential
growthPotential.description: Mali and Burkina Faso have immense untapped agricultural potential. With the right technologies, infrastructure and training, agricultural production can be multiplied by 3 to 5 times, creating major economic opportunities for farmers and communities.

cta.title: Join the PTASS Project
cta.description: Whether you are a farmer, cooperative, investor or partner, participate in the transformation of agriculture in the Sahel.

farmerRegistration.title: Register a New Farmer

fields.family: Family (family production, subsistence or small trade)
fields.transformationConnection: I wish to be connected to a local transformation center or female entrepreneur for valorization
fields.manureFertilizer: Do you use manure for organic fertilizer?
fields.manureBiogas: Do you use manure for energy production (biogas)?
fields.cooperativeInvestment: Do you wish to invest in a cooperative/processor?

errors.required: Please fill in all required fields
errors.areaInvalid: Invalid area (must be a positive number)
errors.cooperativeLink: Indicate if you are linked to a cooperative
errors.cooperativeRole: Indicate your role in the cooperative
errors.cooperativeSupport: Select at least one type of support
errors.productionObjectives: Select at least one production objective

farmerRegistration.noLoan: All partnerships and support are without loans: use of local resources, free training, shared equipment through cooperatives.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: View of registered farmers on the platform
dashboard.note: This dashboard displays demonstration data. In the final version, data will be synchronized in real time with the platform database.

soilDiagnostic.title: Soil Diagnostic
soilDiagnostic.subtitle: Analyze your soil problems and get recommendations

diseaseDetection.title: Plant Disease Detection
diseaseDetection.subtitle: Upload a leaf photo to detect diseases

thinkTank.title: Think Tank Solutions
thinkTank.subtitle: Recommendations and solutions for sustainable agriculture
